subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer and Stan Wawrinka took Switzerland close to its first Davis Cup final in 22 years after cruising to straight-set wins in the opening singles against Italy in Geneva.
snippet: Roger Federer and Stan Wawrinka took Switzerland close to its first Davis Cup final in 22 years after cruising to straight-set wins in the opening singles against Italy in Geneva.
